b4914f6d-93a0-4f50-8751-2d357fa15d68.description: Earners of this badge are certified licensees who facilitate courses that implement Transactional Competence. They are skilled in training others in these fundamental frameworks: Personality and Behaving Transactionally, the Transaction Cycle, Narratives of the Transaction Cycle, the Conditions of Life, the 13 Steps for Building an Offer, PSTI, and the Fives Stages of Professional Influence.
b4914f6d-93a0-4f50-8751-2d357fa15d68.name: Influential U Consultant (IUC)

c2424ca0-8555-4260-a1cd-4d98f598c71f.description: Earners of this badge have successfully completed a six-month study that includes the study, practice, and application of the fundamentals of Transactional Competence: Transact to produce compliance; have your offers, requests, assessments, and assertions accepted. Practice negotiating with differing personality types and behaviors. Build and present business offers to have them accepted quickly by your specific customer.
c2424ca0-8555-4260-a1cd-4d98f598c71f.name: Fundamentals of Transaction

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a six-month course including 100+ hours of study and application.

59b7b0ca-8269-4077-8387-62518d20ff10.description: Earners of this badge are certified licensees who facilitate courses that certify Influential U Consultants (IUCs) to implement Transactional Competence. They have completed the four-year IU Curriculum. They are skilled in training others in these fundamental frameworks: Personality and Behaving Transactionally, the Transaction Cycle, Narratives of the Transaction Cycle, the Conditions of Life, the 13 Steps for Building an Offer, PSTI, and the Fives Stages of Professional Influence.
59b7b0ca-8269-4077-8387-62518d20ff10.name: Influential U Consultant Trainer (IUCT)

3326e6f7-2aeb-495e-87e8-cabceb7160c2.description: The Influential U Faculty facilitates the courses in our four-year curriculum. Our curriculum is the gold standard of our world-class training and education. Faculty lead or co-lead our courses to students enrolled in the education. Beginning as apprentices, our Faculty are first certified as Secondary, then Primary level faculty. Certified Primaries are eligible for employment consideration.
3326e6f7-2aeb-495e-87e8-cabceb7160c2.name: Influential U Faculty

alignments.name: Influential U Course Facilitation
alignments.description: Accountable for Curriculum Course Facilitation - working with other leaders, the office of admissions, and supporting and mentoring participants in all aspects of their participation, study, and practice - gathering data, preparing reports, and managing accurate statistics.

alignments.name: Philosophy of Transactionalism
alignments.description: An in-depth understanding of the philosophy of Transactinoalism, the philosophy that grounds Transactional Competence.

badge_template_activities.title: The application of Transactional Competence

3b366a90-d6ce-4454-99f7-909fa5cc2f92.description: Earners of this badge are certified licensees who facilitate courses that implement Transactional Competence with 50 seats or more annually. This license is awarded to an enterprise consisting of one IUCT and five IUCs minimally.
3b366a90-d6ce-4454-99f7-909fa5cc2f92.name: Influential U Master Licensee

476a1ffc-d808-48f9-bf9a-f5a9d9def49a.description: Earners of this badge have successfully completed an advanced two-year study that includes the study, practice, and application of Transactional Competence. This consists of a deep dive into the philosophy of Transactionalism, constructing each of the Conditions of Transaction, Business Strategy Manual, and participating in peer events for practical practice and application. Prerequisite: Mechanics and Practice.
476a1ffc-d808-48f9-bf9a-f5a9d9def49a.name: MAP2: PSTI - Planning, Strategy, Tactics, and Implementation

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a two-day course including 12 hours of practice and application.

46533d26-159b-4dd7-952e-8581045ba3e3.description: Earners of this badge have successfully completed a two-day (12 Hour) study that includes the study, practice, and application of the fundamentals of Transactional Competence. This course teaches individuals and teams to think accurately about the Conditions of Life: unavoidable situations and conditions all human beings address (or suffer). This is fundamental to making powerful offers.
46533d26-159b-4dd7-952e-8581045ba3e3.name: 15 Unavoidable Conditions of Life

5ce7c87e-ce55-4abf-a235-fe86a1fa1288.description: Earners of this badge have successfully completed a twelve-session, six-month personalized professional development that includes the study, practice, and application of the fundamentals of Transactional Competence. Executive coaching is tailored training to provide unique solutions that address real-time career challenges to break through barriers blocking achievement and whole-life satisfaction.
5ce7c87e-ce55-4abf-a235-fe86a1fa1288.name: Executive One-On-One

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 12 consulting sessions including 12 hours of practice and application.

This course teaches individuals and teams to move themselves and their companies through the stages of professional influence — the successful buy-in of value propositions for people, products, services, and companies.
c2eb81e1-8da8-46bd-96ad-b6f4cc20c294.name: Five Stages of Professional Influence

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a two-day course including 12 hours of practice and application.
